text: Kare no min no naka no kōman'na chōrō-tachi wa itta. `Shuaibu yo, watashi-tachi wa, anata mo anata to issho ni shinkō suru mono-tachi mo, kono machi kara tsuihō surudearou. Samonakereba, watashi-tachi no shūkyō ni kaerubekidearu.' Kare wa itta. `Tatoe watashi-tachi ga (sore o) imikiratte ite mo na nodesu ka
